```{r}
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```
```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2020, week = 5)
sf_trees <- tuesdata$sf_trees
```
```{r}
summary(sf_trees)
```
```{r}
sf_trees <- sf_trees %>% 
  mutate(year = year(date))
```
```{r}
sf_trees %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(n=n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
```
```{r}
test <- sf_trees %>% 
  filter(!is.na(year)) %>% 
  group_by(year, caretaker) %>% 
  summarise(n=n())
```

```{r}
sf_trees %>% 
  filter(!is.na(year)) %>% 
  group_by(year,caretaker) %>% 
  summarise(n=n()) %>% 
  ggplot()+
  geom_col(aes(x = year, y = n, fill = caretaker)) 
```
